text:
During the first full fiscal year of the City and County after the effective date of this Chapter, the City and County shall target for enforcement only Contracts for apparel, garments and corresponding accessories, materials, supplies or equipment. Agreements for other Goods shall be targeted for enforcement in accordance with the procedure set forth in Section 
12U.6. 
(Added by Ord. 223-05, File No. 051257, App. 9/16/2005)
